text: Amazon Scout is a 6 wheeled robot used to deliver packages for the E-commerce site, Amazon.com. Amazon Scout originally debuted on January 23, 2019, delivering packages to Amazon customers in Snohomish County, Washington. Amazon scouts move on sidewalks, at a walking pace. In August, 2019, the robots started delivering packages to customers Irvine, California on a test basis, with human monitors. The package is stored inside of the robot, and driven to the customer. Amazon acquired the robotics company Dispatch to build the robot. ==See also== *Amazon Robotics *List of mergers and acquisitions by Amazon == References == Category:Robots
title: Amazon Scout
